verses.verse: The proverbs <S%H4912><s%> of Solomon <S%H8010><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>:
To know <S%H3045><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and instruction <S%H4148><s%>; To discern <S%H995><s%> the words <S%H561><s%> of understanding <S%H998><s%>;
To receive <S%H3947><s%> instruction <S%H4148><s%> in wise <S%H7919><s%> dealing <S%H6664><s%>, In righteousness and justice <S%H6664><s%> and equity <S%H4339><s%>;
To give <S%H5414><s%> prudence <S%H6195><s%> to the simple <S%H6612><s%>, To the young man <S%H5288><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%> and discretion <S%H4209><s%>:

That the wise <S%H2450><s%> man may hear <S%H8085><s%>, and increase <S%H3254><s%> in learning <S%H3948><s%>; And that the man of understanding <S%H995><s%> may attain <S%H7069><s%> unto sound counsels <S%H8458><s%>:
To understand <S%H995><s%> a proverb <S%H4912><s%>, and a figure <S%H4426><s%>, The words <S%H1697><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%>, and their dark sayings <S%H2420><s%>.

The fear <S%H3374><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of knowledge <S%H1847><s%>; But the foolish <S%H191><s%> despise <S%H936><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and instruction <S%H4148><s%>.
My son <S%H1121><s%>, hear <S%H8085><s%> the instruction <S%H4148><s%> of thy father <S%H1><s%>, And forsake <S%H5203><s%> not the law <S%H8451><s%> of thy mother <S%H517><s%>:
For they shall be a chaplet <S%H3880><s%> of grace <S%H2580><s%> unto thy head <S%H7218><s%>, And chains <S%H6060><s%> about thy neck <S%H1621><s%>.
My son <S%H1121><s%>, if sinners <S%H2400><s%> entice <S%H6601><s%> thee <S%H14><s%>, Consent thou not.

If they say <S%H559><s%>, Come <S%H3212><s%> with us <S%H693><s%>, Let us lay wait for blood <S%H1818><s%>; Let us lurk <S%H6845><s%> privily for the innocent <S%H5355><s%> without cause <S%H2600><s%>;
Let us swallow them up <S%H1104><s%> alive <S%H2416><s%> as Sheol <S%H7585><s%>, And whole <S%H8549><s%>, as those that go down <S%H3381><s%> into the pit <S%H953><s%>;
We shall find <S%H4672><s%> all precious <S%H3368><s%> substance <S%H1952><s%>; We shall fill <S%H4390><s%> our houses <S%H1004><s%> with spoil <S%H7998><s%>;
Thou shalt cast <S%H5307><s%> thy lot <S%H1486><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> us <S%H259><s%>; We will all have one purse <S%H3599><s%>:
My son <S%H1121><s%>, walk <S%H3212><s%> not thou in the way <S%H1870><s%> with them <S%H4513><s%>; Refrain thy foot <S%H7272><s%> from their path <S%H5410><s%>:
For their feet <S%H7272><s%> run <S%H7323><s%> to evil <S%H7451><s%>, And they make haste <S%H4116><s%> to shed <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>.
For in vain <S%H2600><s%> is the net <S%H7568><s%> spread <S%H2219><s%> In the sight <S%H5869><s%> of any bird <S%H1167><s%>:
And these lay wait <S%H693><s%> for their own blood <S%H1818><s%>; They lurk privily <S%H6845><s%> for their own lives <S%H5315><s%>.
So are the ways <S%H734><s%> of every one that is greedy <S%H1214><s%> of gain <S%H1215><s%>; It taketh away <S%H3947><s%> the life <S%H5315><s%> of the owners thereof <S%H1167><s%>.
Wisdom <S%H2454><s%> crieth <S%H7442><s%> aloud in the street <S%H2351><s%>; She uttereth <S%H5414><s%> her voice <S%H6963><s%> in the broad places <S%H7339><s%>;

She crieth <S%H7121><s%> in the chief place <S%H7218><s%> of concourse <S%H1993><s%>; At the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the gates <S%H8179><s%>, In the city <S%H5892><s%>, she uttereth <S%H559><s%> her words <S%H561><s%>:

How long <S%H6612><s%>, ye simple ones, will ye love <S%H157><s%> simplicity <S%H6612><s%>? And scoffers <S%H3887><s%> delight <S%H2530><s%> them in scoffing <S%H3944><s%>, And fools <S%H3684><s%> hate <S%H8130><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%>?
Turn <S%H7725><s%> you at my reproof <S%H8433><s%>: Behold <S%H5042><s%>, I will pour out my spirit <S%H7307><s%> upon you <S%H3045><s%>; I will make known my words unto you <S%H1697><s%>.
Because I have called <S%H7121><s%>, and ye have refused <S%H3985><s%>; I have stretched out <S%H5186><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%>, and no man hath regarded <S%H7181><s%>;
But ye have set at nought <S%H6544><s%> all my counsel <S%H6098><s%>, And would <S%H14><s%> none of my reproof <S%H8433><s%>:
I also will laugh <S%H7832><s%> in the day of your calamity <S%H343><s%>; I will mock <S%H3932><s%> when your fear <S%H6343><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%>;

When your fear <S%H6343><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%> as a storm <S%H5492><s%>, And your calamity <S%H343><s%> cometh <S%H857><s%> on as a whirlwind <S%H5492><s%>; When distress <S%H6869><s%> and anguish <S%H6695><s%> come upon you <S%H935><s%>.
Then will they call <S%H7121><s%> upon me <S%H6030><s%>, but I will not answer; They will seek me diligently <S%H7836><s%>, but they shall not find me <S%H4672><s%>:
For that they hated <S%H8130><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%>, And did not choose <S%H977><s%> the fear <S%H3374><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>:
They would <S%H14><s%> none of my counsel <S%H6098><s%>; They despised <S%H5006><s%> all my reproof <S%H8433><s%>.
Therefore shall they eat <S%H398><s%> of the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of their own way <S%H1870><s%>, And be filled <S%H7646><s%> with their own devices <S%H4156><s%>.
For the backsliding <S%H4878><s%> of the simple <S%H6612><s%> shall slay <S%H2026><s%> them <S%H7962><s%>, And the careless ease of fools <S%H3684><s%> shall destroy them <S%H6><s%>.
But whoso hearkeneth <S%H8085><s%> unto me shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> securely <S%H983><s%>, And shall be quiet <S%H7599><s%> without fear <S%H6343><s%> of evil <S%H7451><s%>.
